name: Rocks'n'Diamonds
summary: A Boulder Dash, Emerald Mine, Supaplex, Sokoban etcetera inspired arcade game
description: This package provides the game engine for Rocks'n'Diamonds, an arcade game in the tradition of "Boulder Dash", "Emerald Mine", "Supaplex", "Sokoban", etcetera. Game levels emulating all of these can be downloaded from ArtSoft.org.
